import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { Form } from "react-bootstrap"; import axios from "axios"; export default function VehicleDetailsForm(props) { const { handleChange, checkoutForm } = props; const [carModels, setCarModels] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { const fetchData = async () => { const {data} = await axios.get('http://165.227.108.163:5050/cars/get_all_makes/') setCarModels(data); console.log("Berna") console.log(data); }; fetchData(); },[]) return (
